pullrequest.title: Upgrade to fuel-tools1 and automatically update paths -> pull request #2800

content.raw:
Opening a save dialog box when inserting a model deserves some planning. I'd like to spend some time thinking about how to make Fuel user-friendly.

The release of Fuel into Gazebo9 should be considered experimental. Requiring a few extra steps by a user is okay. I'd rather see the message output instead of a save dialog.
content.html:
Opening a save dialog box when inserting a model deserves some planning. I'd like to spend some time thinking about how to make Fuel user-friendly.

The release of Fuel into Gazebo9 should be considered experimental. Requiring a few extra steps by a user is okay. I'd rather see the message output instead of a save dialog.
